title: Now Justice Wigneswaran takes over the baton for a separate Tamil Homeland
content: – by Shenali D Waduge – Now that Jusice Wigneswaran who “did not want this position” and who was “forced into this position” under “so much pressure” as the TNA’s common candidate for the post of Chief Minister we are forced to view him as joining the list of others attempting to seek the goal…
